description: Lists the latest device positions for requested devices.

parameters.name: TrackerName
parameters.description: The tracker resource retrieving the device position.

parameters.name: DeviceIds
parameters.description: Devices whose position you want to retrieve. For example, for two devices: device-ids=DeviceId1&device-ids=DeviceId2 (string) ---

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Contains error details for each device that failed to send its position to the tracker resource.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device that didn't return a position.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the batch request error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message with the reason for the batch request error.

nested_items.name: DevicePositions
nested_items.description: Contains device position details such as the device ID, position, and timestamps for when the position was received and sampled.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The device whose position you retrieved.

nested_items.name: SampleTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the device's position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: ReceivedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the tracker resource received the device position in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: Horizontal
nested_items.description: Estimated maximum distance, in meters, between the measured position and the true position of a device, along the Earth's surface.

nested_items.name: PositionProperties
nested_items.description: The properties associated with the position.
